text:
Local Government (Highways) Order 1994

In pursuance and exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 23(2) of the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 , I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, hereby make the following order.

14 February 1994

P. H. BENNETT

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

T. JOHN CLEARY

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Highways) Order 1994 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Revocations
    The Statutory Rules specified in Schedule 1 to this order are revoked.

4. Bridges to be maintained or renewed by the State
    The bridges specified in Schedule 2 to this order are declared to be bridges that are to be maintained or renewed by the State.

SCHEDULE 1 - Statutory Rules revoked

Clause 3

Proclamation under section 418(2) of the Local Government Act 1962 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1965, No. 11  Proclamation under section 418(2) of the Local Government Act 1962 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1973, No. 61  Proclamation under section 418(2) of the Local Government Act 1962 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1980, No. 166  Local Government (Highways-Bridges) Order 1986 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1986, No. 91  Local Government (Highways-Bridges) Order 1989 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1989, No. 194
